text: The festival is intended for everyone who is just a little bit interested in the world of specialty coffee. It doesn't matter if you are a professional in the industry, a coffee enthusiast or if you tasted your first v60 yesterday and are just getting acquainted. And if the caffeine gets to be too much for you - the festival offers an alternative in the form of alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks and savoury and sweet treats.
about.title: What is roast!?

colab.description: Roast! would be nothing without the participation of roasters, exhibitors, speakers and sponsors. If you fall into this category, be sure to click to find out more. Maybe you'll be interested in what we have to offer. And if not, drop us an email and maybe we can work something out.

exhibitors.text: Are you interested in our event and would you like to participate? We are looking for roasters, cafes and speakers.
exhibitors.title: Exhibitors

sponsors.text: Are you a company that likes to support cultural events? You can be rewarded with a logo on the event, promotional materials, tickets and interesting packages for your employees.
sponsors.title: Sponsors

colab.title: Cooperation

exhibitors.text: Information for exhibitors, participating roasters, cafes and coffee equipment dealers.
exhibitors.title: Exhibitors

content.text: Kavárna Punkt. se ráda pyšní tím, že si všechny své sladké dobroty peče sám. Přijď ochutnat a osladit si život.
content.title: Sladký bar

content.text: Kde? U nás na Roastu! Kolik? Fakt hodně. A bude to prý i slaný.
content.title: Slaný bar

content.text: Festival bez piva není festival. Ať už bude žízeň, chuť nebo budeš potřebovat jen utéct od kafe, máme pro tebe alternativu v podobě točeného pivka od pivovaru Stern! Krýgl vlastní a nebo ti zapůjčíme znovupoužitelný zálohovaný kelímek.
content.title: Pivo

content.text: Lidstvo zná víno mnohem déle než kávu. Máš-li chuť na návrat k bobulím, ochutnej víno od Kláry a nebo si dej to od Báry. Obě budou skvělé.
content.title: Víno

content.text: Kolagen je bar, drinkový catering a plno věcí k tomu. Jediný, co mu chybí, je domov, tak je doma všude, kam si ho pozvou. Vystrkuje růžky kdekoli, kde má smysl dělat zajímavý drinky. Hraje si s netradičními technikami a absurdními nápady, ale vše podřizuje tomu, aby hosté i jejich mámy odcházeli spokojení.
content.title: Míchané drinky

content.text: Ať z jakéhokoliv důvodu upřednostňuješ rostlinnou alternativu mléka před kravským, myslíme na tebe! Na všech kávových barech bude připravena zásoba ovesného mléka od Oatly
content.title: Mléko

content.text: Obnov svou sbírku hrníčků, vyber doma ty, co už nepoužíváš a vyměň je v našem hrníčkovém swapu!
content.title: Swap hrníčků

gastro.text: Kromě kávového programu se můžeš behem festivalu oddávat i dalším činnostem. Navštiv Sladký bar nebo si dej míchaný drink ať nabereš síly na další kávové zážitky.
gastro.title: Doprovodný program

info.text: Our bars will feature a rotation of local and out-of-town roasters of select coffees. You can taste all kinds of milk drinks at two bars. On the third, you'll taste a fine-tuned espresso with no additives. Can't have regular milk? We're ready for that too!
info.title: Espresso bars

info.text: V60, Chemex, Aeropress or Coldbrew? You can also taste these alternative brews at our brew bars. We give roasters complete freedom to choose the brew that best suits their beans.
info.title: Brew bars

info.text: Would you like to try more than a dozen alternative coffee preparations or test your sensory skills? Our professional baristas will guide you through everything and will be happy to answer any questions you may have.
info.title: Workshops and cuppings

info.text: Our special guests will guide you through the nooks and crannies of coffee technology, chemistry and culture you may not have known existed. In the chapel behind the main hall, professionals from the coffee scene and beyond will be waiting for you with comfortable chairs.
info.title: Lectures

lastYear.description: Roast! will be held for the second time this year. In 2023, our festival had a pilot test year. We wanted to start a small festival and see if there was any interest in such an event in Brno. It turned out that an event of this format has its place and that's why we are aiming higher this year.
lastYear.title: Previous year

text: We are a group of Brno coffee enthusiasts and professionals who decided to bring the culture of European coffee festivals to Brno.
You can meet individual members of our team behind the bar in several Brno cafes, roasters, bars and other establishments.
What binds us together is our love for specialty coffee and gastronomy.
organizers.title: Organizers

programLoadingText: We are still roasting the festival program for you.
programReadyText: The program is properly roasted now!
programSubjectToChange: This program is subject to change

text: Besides other activities, you can look forward to individual presentations of following coffee roasters.
promotedRoasters.title: Coffee roasters
